question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the fountain at the entrance of the community. Is the destination within sight at the current location? If yes, where is the destination in the view?  
choose:  
A. The fountain near the entrance of the community is currently located in the upper left corner of my field of view.  
B. The fountain near the entrance of the community is currently in the center of my field of view.  
C. The fountain near the entrance of the community is currently located in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
D. The fountain near the entrance of the residential area is not within my field of view.  
E. Near the fountain at the entrance of the community, currently located in the upper right corner of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The fountain near the entrance of the community is clearly visible and located in the center of the field of view.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 13)]
Option: [B]
Reason: From the initial position (0:00-0:13), the fountain is clearly visible and located in the center of the field of view.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The fountain near the entrance of the community is clearly visible and located in the center of the field of view.
